name: Belleau Wood - Shade - Toro
additionalNotes: Belleau Wood is an exciting combination to the tradition of Cuban sandwich style with the innovation of Ecuadorian premium layers. With layer options ranging from the softness of the Connecticut shade to the intensity of the mature Ecuadorian, these blends promise a unique experience for tobacco lovers. Its long and short stuffed cigar blend ensures a complex and balanced taste that will captivate the most demanding fans.
